Entries.default: [SkillCheck 0] spots a primitive but no less dangerous bear trap laid directly in your path.
You're careful to skirt the trap - and a few others - and continue on your way through the jungle.
Lagufaeth territorial sigils mark your path at regular intervals. You walk cautiously, keeping a close eye on your surroundings.
A sudden cry rends the quiet of the trail. Despite your caution, [Specified 0]'s leg has been caught in a primitive bear trap.
A quick, panicked yell surprises you. You look back to see that [Specified 0] has tumbled into a deep pit obscured by leaves and dirt.
You hear a sudden, sharp intake of breath and look up to find [Specified 0] caught in a net high above the trail.
Despite your caution, a primitive bear trap springs up from the leaf litter and bites into your ankle.

The ground gives way beneath you, and you tumble down into a crude spike pit. A wooden spike grazes your thigh, but you are otherwise uninjured. You're lucky the trap was not better-made - you would surely be dead.
A wire tightens around your ankle. You're hoisted high into the air above the trail, smashing into tree trunks and branches as you go.
[SkillCheck 0] spots a patch of disturbed dirt on the path ahead of you. Upon closer inspection, [SkillCheck 0] discovers that it's in fact a crude spike pit camouflaged with litterfall and netting.

[SkillCheck 0] puts a hand on your shoulder and points out a well-hidden tripwire bisecting the path ahead of you. Careful inspection reveals that the wire is attached to a small boulder suspended above the trail.
Your vigilance is rewarded - further down the path, you spot a primitive but no less dangerous bear trap laid directly in your path.
You spot a patch of disturbed dirt on the path ahead of you. Upon closer inspection, you discover that it's in fact a crude spike pit camouflaged with litterfall and netting.
A well-hidden tripwire bisects the path ahead of you. Careful inspection reveals that the wire is attached to a small boulder suspended above the trail.
Lagufaeth stream from the jungle as your struggle to free yourself from the trap. They lift blowdarts to their thin lips and point them at you.
Lagufaeth stream from the jungle as you work to free [Specified 0] from the trap. They lift blowdarts to their thin lips and point them at you.
You hear a rustling in the underbrush. A group of lagufaeth dart onto the path, shoot blowdarts in your direction, and dash back into hiding before you have a chance to retaliate.

You hear a rustling in the underbrush. As you work to free [Specified 0] from the trap, a group of lagufaeth dart onto the path, shoot blowdarts in your direction, and dash back into hiding before you have a chance to retaliate.
[Hold your ground.]
[Chase after the lagufaeth.]
[Let the lagufaeth retreat.]
The lagufaeth melt into the jungle, disappearing like mist on the water. It's as if they were never there at all.
The lagufaeth close in, weapons at the ready.
You crash through the underbrush, leaping nimbly over fallen branches and gnarled tree roots, and manage to outrun the lagufaeth.
You turn to flee, but the lagufaeth are more nimble than you expected. They surround you in moments, weapons at the ready.
You crash through the underbrush, leaping nimbly over fallen branches and gnarled tree roots, and manage to run down the lagufaeth.
You crash through the underbrush after the lagufaeth, but they're more nimble and fleet of foot than you expected, and you're unable to keep up with them.
[Flee.]
